wikipedia_page.main: Eric Halsall (18 March 1920 – 21 October 1996) was an English countryman, author and television presenter. He was best known for his fourteen-year run as a commentator on BBC TV series One Man and His Dog.

response: One Man and His Dog is a BBC television series in the United Kingdom featuring sheepdog trials, originally presented by Phil Drabble, with commentary by Eric Halsall and, later, by Ray Ollerenshaw. It was first aired on 17 February 1976 and continues today (since 2013) as a special annual edition of Countryfile. In 1994, Robin Page replaced Drabble as the main presenter. Gus Dermody took over as commentator until 2012.
